clueGame

Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • clueGame.Player
      • clueGame.ComputerPlayer

  • public class ComputerPlayer
extends Player

    ComputerPlayer

    This class extends Player by adding methods specific to CPUs as opposed to human players.
    Since:
    2017-11-02
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Adam Nelson, Youjun Lee
    See Also:
    Player

                      java.awt.Color col,
                      int r,
                      int c)
        Generates a ComputerPlayer from a config file.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the player.
        col - The player's color.
        r - The starting row for the player.
        c - The starting column for the player.

      • makeAccusation

        public Solution makeAccusation()
        The computer randomly makes an accusation based off the cards it has in its hand and cards that it has already seen.
        Returns:
        Solution The computer player's accusation.

      • createSuggestion

        public Solution createSuggestion(Board board,
                                 BoardCell location,
                                 java.util.Set<Card> dealtCards)
        The computer randomly makes a suggestion based off the cards it has in its hand and cards that it has already seen.
        Parameters:
        board - The game board.
        location - The current cell the player is located at.
        dealtCards - The set of cards that have been dealt to any player.
        Returns:
        Solution The computer player's suggestion.

        Resets the last visited room for testing purposes only.
